'''Abyssal Crusader''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Domains and Spiral Abyss: Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to obtain all Abyssal Stars in the [[Spiral Abyss]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* This achievement requires only the 72 Abyssal Stars from the Abyss Corridor (floors 1–8); it does not include stars from the Abyssal Moon Spire (floors 9–12).
